fields.description: The name of the host the scan was performed on
The version of the application the scan was performed on
The number of directories processed by the scan
Meta data associated with the representation, as described in <<metadata,Meta Data>>
The number of matches found by the scan
The number of non-directory files processed by the scan
Human-readable message describing the analysis state
The date/time when the scan was created
The name of the user who created the scan (first/last), or username
The size of the scan within the application
The type of analysis and resulting data.
Represents the stage in the analysis lifecycle the scanis in.
The date/time when the scan was updated

links.description: Resource representing the code location the scan is associated with
Resource representing the sequence of component imports associated with the scan
Resource representing the sequence of component imports associated with the scan
